content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electronic Circuit Factory at position(9.5, 11.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Input chest at position(6.5, 11.5)
- Burner inserter at position(7.5, 11.5) that moves items from input chest to assembling machine
- Assembling machine at position(9.5, 11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at position(11.5, 11.5) that moves finished products to output chest
- Output chest at position(12.5, 11.5) containing 801 electronic circuits

### Power Generation System around position(-7.0, 24.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe network carrying water at positions(-9.5,23.5), (-8.5,23.5), (-8.5,22.5), (-7.5,22.5)
- Boiler at position(-7.0, 24.5) with 7 coal fuel
- Steam pipe network at positions(-5.5,24.5), (-5.5,25.5), (-5.5,26.5)
- Steam engine at position(-2.5, 24.5)
- Electricity distribution network connecting multiple poles and powered entities

### Science Pack Processing at position(0.5, 28.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(0.5, 28.5)
- Burner inserter at position(0.5, 30.5) feeding science packs to lab
- Storage chest at position(0.5, 31.5) containing 865 automation science packs and 347 logistic science packs

### Smelting Area
Consists of three furnaces:
- Furnace at position(0.0, 0.0) with 9 coal
- Furnace at position(2.0, 0.0) with 8 coal  
- Furnace at position(4.0, 4.0) with 9 coal

ERROR TIPS

### Research Technology Prerequisites Errors
- Research technologies in correct order - many technologies require prerequisites:
  - Chemical science pack requires Advanced Electronics
  - Advanced Electronics requires Plastics
  - Plastics requires Oil Processing
  - Oil Processing requires Fluid Handling
  - Fluid Handling requires Engine technology
  - Advanced Oil Processing requires Chemical Science Pack
  - Lubricant requires Advanced Oil Processing

### Already Researched Technology Errors
- Check if technology is already researched before attempting to research again. Following were already completed:
  - Advanced Material Processing
  - Steel Processing
  - Military Science
  - Electronics
  - Electric Energy Distribution

### Resource Shortage Errors
- Electronic circuit assembly machine lacks required ingredients:
  - Iron plates (1 needed)
  - Copper cables (3 needed)

### Fuel Management
- Monitor coal levels in entities requiring fuel
- Ensure sufficient coal supply for power generation and burner inserters
